titles.title: It Came Upon the Midnight Clear (Edmund H. Sears)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It came upon the midnight clear, That glorious song of old; From angels bending near the earth To touch their harps of gold. “Peace on the earth good will to men, From heaven’s all gracious King!” The world in solemn stillness lay To hear the angels sing.{/lang-eng}
